data.title: 9 Erica Kane Trivia Quizzes (Questions and Answers)
data.meta_description: The best quizzes in this category as voted by visitors.
data.text:
1.

Erica Kane/Kent Bogard/Connie Wilkes (1983)

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

One of Erica's biggest storylines during the 1980s was when she faced off with imposter Connie Wilkes and interacted with Kent Bogard. Enjoy this quiz on that entertaining plot! All air dates are American.

Average, 10 Qns, CAGuy0206, Mar 10 24

Average

CAGuy0206

Mar 10 24

52 plays

2.

Erica Kane: Model Extraordinaire

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Erica Kane made a name for herself as a model. Relive those glorious memories with this quiz! Good luck! All air dates are American.

Average, 10 Qns, CAGuy0206, Jul 29 23

Average

CAGuy0206

Jul 29 23

92 plays

3.

The Maternal History Of Erica Kane

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Welcome, "All My Children" fans! I hope you'll enjoy this quiz about Erica's approach to motherhood through the varied stages of her life.

Average, 10 Qns, memorylane42, Sep 17 16

Average

memorylane42

1385 plays

4.

All About Erica

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

She is Pine Valley's biggest love to hate vixen. "TV Guide" once called her "larger than life." Who is she? She is Erica Kane! See if you are a true Erica fan with this quiz! Good luck! All air dates are American.

Tough, 10 Qns, CAGuy0206, Sep 17 16

Tough

CAGuy0206

303 plays

5.

Erica's Women in Media Award Speech

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

All of these questions pertain to the special episode where Erica gave an acceptance speech after winning the Women in Media Award in January of 1996. Good luck! All air dates are American.

8.

Erica's addiction

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

My favorite storyline from "All My Children" has been when Erica was addicted to painkillers and finally kicked her habit. Test your memory on that story right now! Good luck! All air dates are American.

9.

Erica and Love Triangles

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Erica has attracted many men over the years and sometimes was involved in intense love triangles. Test your memory on some of them now! Good luck! All air dates are American.
